column2: BRIEF-South Jersey Industries Posts Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.66 May 7 (Reuters) - South Jersey Industries Inc: * Q1 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.40 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.93 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * REAFFIRMING 2018 ECONOMIC EARNINGS GUIDANCE OF $1.57 TO $1.65 PER DILUTED SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-South Jersey Industries Enters Note Purchase Agreement April 27 (Reuters) - South Jersey Industries Inc: * SOUTH JERSEY INDUSTRIES - ON APRIL 25, CO ENTERED NOTE PURCHASE AGREEMENT PROVIDING FOR ISSUANCE BY CO OF $250 MILLION OF SENIOR UNSECURED NOTES * SOUTH JERSEY INDUSTRIES SAYS ISSUED $90 MILLION AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF 3.18% SENIOR NOTES, SERIES 2018A, DUE APRIL 25, 2021 - SEC FILING * SOUTH JERSEY INDUSTRIES SAYS AGREEMENT ALSO PROVIDES FOR ISSUANCE OF $80 MILLION 3.78% SENIOR NOTES, SERIES 2018B, DUE 2028 * SOUTH JERSEY INDUSTRIES SAYS NOTE PURCHASE AGREEMENT ALSO PROVIDES FOR ISSUANCE OF $80 MILLION OF 3.88% SENIOR NOTES, SERIES 2018C, DUE 2030 - SEC FILING Source text : [bit.ly/2w1760H] Further company coverage:

BRIEF-South Jersey Industries Inc Prices Common Stock And Equity Units Offerings April 18 (Reuters) - South Jersey Industries Inc: * SOUTH JERSEY INDUSTRIES, INC. PRICES COMMON STOCK AND EQUITY UNITS OFFERINGS * ANNOUNCED PRICING OF REGISTERED PUBLIC OFFERING OF 11.02 MILLION SHARES OF ITS COMMON STOCK AT $29.50 PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-South Jersey Industries Proposes Common Stock, Equity Units Offerings April 17 (Reuters) - South Jersey Industries Inc: * SJI NEWS RELEASE: SOUTH JERSEY INDUSTRIES, INC. ANNOUNCES PROPOSED COMMON STOCK AND EQUITY UNITS OFFERINGS * PLANS TO CONDUCT CONCURRENT REGISTERED PUBLIC OFFERINGS, OF UP TO $325 MILLION OF SHARES OF ITS COMMON STOCK * SOUTH JERSEY INDUSTRIES - TO CONDUCT CONCURRENT PUBLIC OFFERINGS, A PORTION OF WHICH MAY BE SUBJECT TO FORWARD SALE AGREEMENT, 5.0 MILLION EQUITY UNITS * COMPANY EXPECTS TO ENTER INTO A FORWARD SALE AGREEMENT WITH AN AFFILIATE OF BOFA MERRILL LYNCH Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
